attributes.additional_details: The government If they have any morals will stand up internationally and restrict the England football team from attending a shallow event that is trying to show off to the world, mean while behind the scenes there are the slums that have girls as young as 9 in daily prostitution for as little as 80p a time, if England attend this event they are supporting this corrupt and hypercritical Brazilian government, internationally denounce a meaningless and child's games in order to change a child's life ! Surely that's what we are here for to make a difference!!
